summary: Albert Einstein  was a German-born theoretical physicist who developed the general theory of relativity, one of the two pillars of modern physics .
full_text: The Max Planck medal is the highest award of the Deutsche Physikalische Gesellschaft ; the world's largest organization of physicists; for extraordinary achievements in theoretical physics. It is awarded annually. The winner is awarded with gold medal and hand-written parchment.
title: Max Planck Medal
